ghostPage.plaintext:
The DSNP Developer Portal is your resource for documentation, tooling, technical
guidance around testing, community support, and more – everything a curious
developer needs to start building novel applications with DSNP. 

The left navigation bar will take you to more detailed content, and a few key
links are below:

The Idea
The Decentralized Social Networking Protocol (DSNP) is a new open source
protocol that allows users to own, control, and manage their social graph data.
The goal is to enable the world to move away from monopolistic, 'walled garden'
social network providers and towards a more open, innovative ecosystem – one in
which developers like you can build new applications based on DSNP's universally
accessible but decentralized social graph.

We encourage all developers to start digging in by reading the full white paper.

Whitepaper [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/papers]The Code
The DSNP specification and supporting code are collaboratively developed through
open source processes and hosted at ProjectLiberty.io, our GitHub organization.
Follow the link below to check out our code repos and download working code,
submit new feature requests and bug reports, and help build better developer
documentation. We're always open to suggestions for how we might improve!

Github [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP]Questions
We encourage open and respectful community discussion in our forums. Ask a
question or tell us what you think! Although we're an early stage project, we do
our best to be quick with a response. 

Forums [https://forums.projectliberty.io/]Further Communication
To reach us privately, please email hello@dsnp.org.

Community [../dev-portal-community/]

The DSNP Developer Portal is your resource for documentation, tooling, technical guidance around testing, community support, and more – everything a curious developer needs to start building novel applications with DSNP.

The left navigation bar will take you to more detailed content, and a few key links are below:

The Idea

The Decentralized Social Networking Protocol (DSNP) is a new open source protocol that allows users to own, control, and manage their social graph data. The goal is to enable the world to move away from monopolistic, 'walled garden' social network providers and towards a more open, innovative ecosystem – one in which developers like you can build new applications based on DSNP's universally accessible but decentralized social graph.

We encourage all developers to start digging in by reading the full white paper.

Whitepaper

The Code

The DSNP specification and supporting code are collaboratively developed through open source processes and hosted at ProjectLiberty.io, our GitHub organization. Follow the link below to check out our code repos and download working code, submit new feature requests and bug reports, and help build better developer documentation. We're always open to suggestions for how we might improve!

Github

Questions

We encourage open and respectful community discussion in our forums. Ask a question or tell us what you think! Although we're an early stage project, we do our best to be quick with a response.

Forums

Further Communication

To reach us privately, please email hello@dsnp.org.

Community
